MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles, affecting properties in Violet Bank and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.41am. Our engineers are on their way to the Rosetta Road substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.52am on the 5th of March 2021.
